text: for hundreds of years the American
railway has connected the nation
allowing Commerce and travel to flourish
spanning over a hundred thousand miles
it connects cities businesses and people
maintaining those rails requires a lot
of time and intensive labor
traditionally adoption of new technology
has been slow but that's changing Rio
Grande Pacific is a 30-year old short
line holding company that's helping to
bring the railroad industry into the
21st century with a railway Internet of
Things or riot-- and a little help from
Dell technologies riot is comprised of a
series of connected devices that allow
for the monitoring collection and quick
analysis of a large amounts of data that
used to take days to sort through in the
old days we would go out and inspect
track for hours upon hours walking track
making notes with pen and paper and now
that process is done instantly and riot
isn't just saving the railways time and
money it's improving safety across the
board and helping freight and commuter
rails leverage data to improve on-time
performance and customer experience in
real time one of the biggest innovations
we've brought to the railway Internet of
Things is an on-time performance app all
of this data is transferred live to a
cloud presentation server and get alerts
and say ok we're two minutes late why
are we delayed was it a signal issue was
it a mechanical issue and all that's
done in real time now it's been
estimated that this generates petabytes
of data every day which means that riot
needs serious and reliable storage and
that's where Dell technologies comes in
Delhi MC unity all flash has allowed us
to store our data across sequel
databases we can have full redundancy or
all of the data that we collect with the
thousands of notes and potentially even
millions of notes of information the
technology advancements that we are
recognizing
they will be beneficial to all rivers
[Music]
